{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie1New.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie1New.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory62.jpg'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Connected.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A strange scene unfolds before you. Watanabe and Ayla are standing on two sides, keeping distance from the Corrupted while preparing to fight.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'According to my calculations, the Corrupted are splitting up, moving toward our east and west.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'How are you doing there, ■■■■■?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '...I detected an abnormal signal connecting to my M.I.N.D. 0.34 microseconds ago. This signal must have affected our communication system.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'This signal...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Commandant...? You're watching us, aren't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yep.', 3: '28', 4: 'What are you two doing?', 5: '30'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I see. For a split second, it felt like I was being controlled.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'm assisting ■■■■■ in a temporary clean-up mission.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Commandant, care to explain what's going on?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "So you were kidnapped and put into a connection chamber, because of April Fool's Day... And you have problems identifying us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But from what you said, the recognition discrepancy didn't happen to Lucia.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Perhaps that connection chamber wasn't fully activated just then... Or maybe there was another reason. Anyway, could you describe what we look like to you?", 4: '1'}
{2: "You're Ayla and Watanabe.", 3: '37'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "So I'm Ayla... Hmm.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Watanabe... huh. Why would Commandant see me as Watanabe?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Is this another trick that Lord is playing on me?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "The kidnappers mentioned April Fool's Day. It could all be part of that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Maybe we could find some clues by creating abnormal happenstances. How about...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '■■, put your hand on my chest.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hold on!', 3: '47', 4: "That's harassment!", 5: '48'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's only a behavioral experiment in order to find out the truth.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Harassment...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "No, I'm not doing that. In Commandant's eyes, it would be Watanabe putting his hand on Ayla's... chest, right?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Bugs are often discovered in irregularities. Maybe by inducing conflict, we will be able to test the stability of this connection system.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'This could be the key to solving this issue.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I said no. And please don't talk about these weird things with such a straight face!", 4: '2'}
{1: '487', 2: "Why don't we find some other way?", 3: '57', 4: "Anyway, let's start searching.", 5: '58'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I agree! Let's search for Commandant's whereabouts.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I just ran a second risk calculation. We don't know much about the chamber, so any attempts that may possibly crash the system might be potentially harmful.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Looks like we have to search the area inch by inch.', 4: '2'}
